definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: You prefer to dry-clean your clothes.
sentences.chinese: 你更喜欢干洗你的衣服。

sentences.english: Could I have this jacket dry-cleaned?
sentences.chinese: 我这件夹克可以干洗吗？

sentences.english: A; We'II dry-clean the dress. Then the color won't run.
sentences.chinese: 我们会干洗这条裙子，不会掉色的。

sentences.english: Dry cleaning is evaluated in the first and most extensive monograph.
sentences.chinese: 干洗是评价在第一和最广泛的专着。

sentences.english: I'd like to have my overcoat dry-cleaned, my shirt and pyjamas laundered and my suit pressed.
sentences.chinese: 我的大衣要干洗，衬衫和睡衣要水洗，并烫一套西服。

sentences.english: The normal dry cleaning and laundering applied to textile articles sterilises them satisfactorily .
sentences.chinese: 通常对纺织品的干洗和水洗能够有效杀菌消毒。

sentences.english: It specifically said on the label that the jacket should be dry-cleaned.
sentences.chinese: 标签上明确说了这件夹克衫应该干洗。

sentences.english: High - grade real silk fabrics is best dry-clean .
sentences.chinese: 高档的真丝面料最好干洗。

sentences.english: Exactly. Is it possible to have my overcoat dry-cleaned, too?
sentences.chinese: 对，我的外套大衣可能也要干洗吧。

sentences.english: I'd like this garment dry-cleaned, please.
sentences.chinese: 我想把这件衣服干洗一下。

sentences.english: Dry cleaning installations that use dry cleaning solvents other than perchloroethylene.
sentences.chinese: 干洗装置使用的干洗溶剂以外的其他氯乙烯。

sentences.english: Dry cleaning installations that use dry cleaning solvents other than perchloroethylene.
sentences.chinese: 干洗装置使用的干洗溶剂以外的其他氯乙烯。

sentences.english: Never put the dirty garments into the wardrobe, wash or dry-clean in time.
sentences.chinese: 勿把脏衣服放进衣橱，应及时洗涤或干洗。

sentences.english: "Dry Washing" of welds and torch heating of welds for straightening purposes are not permitted.
sentences.chinese: 不得为了校直而对焊缝进行干洗和火焰加热。
